name: "George Lopez" - Max Quiz | George Lopez | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Dyslexia.

	Max is dyslexic, so he doesn't usually do very well at school.  Dyslexia is when your brain mixes certain letters around, like p's and d's.  Max has inherited this from George, although George never likes to admit he has dyslexia, and he never likes to admit that Max does, either.

questions.text: What causes Max to wet the bed so often?
options: Ernie sneaking in and scaring him all the time
questions.explanation:
Kidney disease.

	In one episode, we learn that Max has a kidney disease that causes him to wet the bed.  At first, Vic says he could have a disease that normally only women get, but men can get if they are sexually active.  This concerns Angie, and she immediately calls Max down and asks him one simple question...  "Did that little tramp steal your virginity?"

questions.text: What was the best $60 George and Max ever spent?
questions.explanation:
Super Ball.

	Max really wanted a super ball, and George tried very hard to get one for him.  This was also the episode that George befriended an Albanian, to make it easier to tell him he would be demoted.  The man knew how much Max wanted a super ball.  George and Max spent a while on eBay looking for a super ball, and they bid against someone else until they paid $60 for it.  Later, the Albanian man came for dinner and gave Max a present. He said it was a super ball he got at a garage sale for $5.  He tried to get it on eBay, but some idiot bid $60.  When Max and George got the super ball, they ran outside, opened the box, and threw it down at the picnic table so it would bounce high in the sky. They both took a while staring at the sky for the ball.  Finally, George walks away and says "That was the best 60 bucks I ever spent."

questions.text: What sport does George want Max to play, although Max isn't very good at it?
questions.explanation:
Baseball.

	Max is horrible at baseball, but George pushes his son into playing.  Max doesn't want to quit, because he doesn't want to disappoint George.

questions.text: When Max is older, a relative moves into the Lopez house, and Max likes her.  What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Veronica.

	Veronica's mom dies, and she entrusted George as Veronica's guardian, and to give Veronica her $1,000,000 when she became mature.  George takes this responsibility very seriously.  In one episode, Max says "I don't know if you've thought about this, but I'm closer to 26 than 0.  Wait....  Yeah, I am."  When he sits down, George says "Stop hitting' on family, man.  That's just lazy."

Brown.

	Max's hair has always been brown.  He keeps it long, and it is naturally curly.  His hair isn't incredibly curly, and can sometimes appear straight, but for the most part is curly.  When he was younger it was really curly, but when he was older, he grew it out even longer, and it wasn't nearly as curly as it once was.

questions.text: Does Max ever go to Special Ed?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	George is very reluctant at letting his son go to Special Ed.  He claims that since he never did, neither should Max.  He wanted Max to suffer through school and take care of his problems "The Lopez Way."  Angie wanted her son to succeed in school, and eventually won the fight.  Max is put into Special Ed and does much better in school because of it.

questions.text: What does Max name the dog?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Needles

	Mr. Needles is an incredibly sick dog, and takes a lot of shots to get better.  Max named him Mr. Needles because of all the needles he needs shot everywhere.  In one episode, the vet finds a tumor in Mr. Needles stomach, and he needs to put the dog down.  Max prays that this will not happen, and miraculously, Mr. Needles survives.  Max loves Mr. Needles.

questions.text: What incident doesn't traumatize Max like Angie thought it would?
questions.explanation:
School shooting.

	At one point in time, their is a shooting at Max's school.  Angie is concerned when Max constantly tells her he isn't scared.  He claims that his video game had worse stuff in it just the day before.  Although he "didn't want to do it," in his video game he had to blow up an old lady.  Angie ignores the violent video game issue and gets right to the fact that the school shooting didn't affect Max.

questions.text: Max has been home schooled before.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Max has never been home schooled.  Carmen is the only one who has been home schooled.  The only reason Carmen is home schooled is because every kid in every school she has ever gone to has made fun of her.  The worst of it was when she was called the "school whore."  It went as far as a boy following her in the bathroom asking her if she wants to "do it," and another boy pulling her shirt up in the hallway.  She has been made fun of in school her whole life, so after trying everything, even private school, the Lopez's finally resort to try home school.
